d: Developing applications with the newest fronted frameworks and libraries such as Angular, React, jQuery and the classic VanillaJs
Easy designing modern applications with the help of the Material Design and the power of HTML/Jade structuring and CSS/SCSS/SASS styling
Structuring, securing and easy maintaining projects among the team with the help of MVC pattern, available APIs and source control management
Converting web applications into Android, iOS, and even the Universal Windows Platform applications with the help of NativeScript
Mobile first designing easy done with the help of Media Queries and Material Layout and newest technologies such as Flex and Grid design
An helpful accessory for web development is my ability to present the product by creating and editing videos with the help of Adobe Premiere Pro
